news.title: Phibsboro For All to host A Girl from Mogadishu film screening
news.summary: The screening will mark the final day of the 16 Days Of Activism Against Gender-Based Violence UN campaign.

news.title: Bad Bunny crowned Spotify Global top artist for the fourth time
news.summary: The artist was streamed 19.8 billion times this year.

news.title: Kabin Crew unveil music video for ‘Dare To Believe’
news.summary: The track is the Official Anthem for The Olympic Federation of Ireland's School Movement Breaks.

news.title: Ash's Tim Wheeler on playing with Coldplay: "When I went on stage it felt like I was in Heaven"
news.summary: Ash are about to bring their 2025 to a close with an Irish tour. Armed with a new album, Ad Astra, they are still at the height of their punky powers. Graham Coxon, The Darkness, Coldplay, Shakespeare and hack ‘n’ slash movies also feature.

news.title: December A&R Department: Dove Ellis, Croíthe, Goldbug and more
news.summary: Guitars are set to stun on the debut EP from Dublin alt. rockers Croíthe who’ve been shacking up in the studio with Just Mustard’s David Noonan.

news.title: New documentary shines spotlight on Sands family
news.summary: Tommy Sands – Clann an Cheoil airs Tuesday, December 30, on RTÉ One at 6.30pm and will also be available on the RTÉ Player.

news.title: SPRINTS, Lisa Hannigan, Brògeal & more announced for Other Voices: Home at the Guinness Storehouse
news.summary: A limited number of free tickets will be available from 12pm on December 5 through the Guinness Storehouse website.

news.title: MTU Cork School of Music Percussion Ensemble release debut album Glioscarnach
news.summary: The record comes out on December 6.

news.title: KNEECAP announce official Dublin afterparty at Index
news.summary: Their latest single 'No Comment' was released last month.

news.title: Björk teases new album in Reykjavik exhibition announcement
news.summary: A newly announced exhibition in Reykjavik next summer features work from an album that is currently "under development".
